trans-unit.source: Represents the display surface of your application.
trans-unit.target: 表示你的应用程序的显示图面。

trans-unit.source: CompositionTarget is a class that represents the display surface on which your application is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: CompositionTarget 是一个类，表示在其绘制你的应用程序的显示图面。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] animation engine provides many features for creating frame-based animation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]动画引擎用于创建基于帧的动画提供了许多功能。

trans-unit.source: However, there are application scenarios in which you need control over rendering on a per frame basis.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在应用程序方案中，您需要通过在每个帧来上呈现的控件。

trans-unit.source: The CompositionTarget object provides the ability to create custom animations based on a per-frame callback.
trans-unit.target: CompositionTarget 对象提供创建基于每帧回调的自定义动画的功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a complete code sample using CompositionTarget, see [Using the CompositionTarget Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160045).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用 CompositionTarget 的完整代码示例，请参阅[使用 CompositionTarget 示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160045)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before the objects in the composition tree are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 恰好在呈现组合树中的对象之前，才发生。

trans-unit.source: The Rendering event is routed to the specified event handler after animation and layout have been applied to the composition tree.
trans-unit.target: 动画和布局应用于组合树中后，呈现事件被路由到指定的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的根的可视<xref href="System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a matrix that can be used to transform coordinates from the rendering destination device to this target.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于转换到此目标中呈现目标设备的坐标的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a matrix that can be used to transform coordinates from this target to the rendering destination device.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于转换到的呈现目标设备坐标从该目标的矩阵。
